title: A Son Mentality | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: A Son Mentality | Joel Osteen
description:
It's easy to have the wrong image of ourselves because of mistakes we've made in the past. But you have to remember that you are a son or daughter of the Most High God. When you understand who you are, you won't let anything keep you from the amazing future God has in store.


Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
